Title: SharePoint 2013 List Forms
Description: This small framework allows you to manage custom list forms using rendering templates and controls stored in a SharePoint library.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This small framework allows you to manage custom list forms using rendering templates and controls stored in a SharePoint library.

Details on my blog:
http://blog.karstein-consulting.com/2013/06/09/sharepoint-2013-list-forms-new-small-framework-project-to-store-list-forms-in-sharepoint-library-part-1

This small framework allows you to manage custom list forms using rendering templates .

List forms are stored in a SharePoint library and managed by a list called "List Forms". There you can register custom form controls (stored in library "List Form Controls") on List Content Types.

This controls can be edited with SharePoint Designer or any other Editor using mapped network drives in Windows.

It supports a simple template mechanism: Templates are used to create new forms on the fly.

Some templates enable you to use jQuery in such forms.

This project is alpha. It's a private development project for demonstration purpose only.
